ygData.subject: Re: [archive-crawler] Heritrix 1.4 fails to follow redirectoins off seed

jirleech wrote:

> The previous verion of heritrix host scope would follow immediate
> redirects from the seed.  

1.2?

> The current version no longer works in this
> fashion. We are using  the HostQueuesFontier.   

I tried 1.2.0, 1.4.0, and HEAD going against archive.org -- which 
directs you to www.archive.org -- and all seem to act the same using 
HostScope and HQF (i.e. they don't follow redirected seeds).  There 
doesn't seem to have been a regression.

On the other hand, this seems like something we should just do.

I tried HEAD using bdbfrontier since HQF is deprecated, even in 1.4.0, 
and this seems to do as you describe.

You don't want to use domainscope?

Yours,
St.Ack
